description:
I've had no issues with it, does exactly what i want it to do, makes torrenting easy. 
if I were to suggest anything it'd be a feature that lets you see the contents of a torrent, but that's not exactly a cut and dry thing.
summary: All you could ever ask for

description: Been using this for a month now, never disappoints. Love the filtering and sorting options.
I was looking for exact same application, this is unique with great experience. thanks
summary: Best thing I found in Ubuntu store

description:
This app needs to be able to allow switching from the Default "DARK mode", which is barely readable, to a lighter mode for better visibility! How can you search for what you can not see!
Otherwise it may be good if it were easier to see what is listed!
A real pain!
